t = [8 16 24 32 40 48 56 64 72];
y1 = [0.823975549 0.825220738 0.683835182 0.621236133 0.582069278 0.459361558 0.449739642 0.327145121 0.28865746];
y2 = [0.812877731 0.705950721 0.620409112 0.50441655 0.44618782 0.432240818 0.413644816 0.234309623 0.187587169];
y3 = [0.801200392 0.690715336 0.624571289 0.49277315 0.393434591 0.361097501 0.332802548 0.244243018 0.178466438];

plot(t,y1,'bo')
hold on
plot(t,y2,'ro')
plot(t,y3,'ko')
f = @(c,x) log(c(1)*x).*c(2).^x;
op = optimoptions(@lsqcurvefit,'FunctionTolerance',eps,'OptimalityTolerance',eps);
c = lsqcurvefit(f,ones(1,2),t,y1,[],[],op);
fplot(@(x)f(c,x),[0,80],'b-')
